p: Therefore, this review shows that essential oils have potential to inhibit SARS-CoV-2 and, based on their physicalâ€“chemical characteristics, their administration may be an alternative to treat and control the COVID-19 symptoms. Furthermore, this study provides valuable information on which essential oils should be prioritized for in vitro and in vivo studies in order to confirm these results and afford a potential drug in the fight against COVID-19.
